h3. History
{{html:
<div ng-show="settings.creditHistory.length == 0">
  There is no history yet.
</div>
<table class="table table-striped table-bordered" ng-cloak ng-show="settings.creditHistory.length > 0">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Date</th>
            <th>Description</th>
            <th>Amount</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr ng-repeat="hist in settings.creditHistory">
            <td>{[hist.date]}</td>
            <td>{[hist.description]}</td>
            <td>{[hist.amount]}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
</div>
}}
